title: Has anyone come up with a rough idea on how to achieve honor?
body:
it took me quite a lot of games to get from locked honour level to honour level 0 but now even with being most honoured a few times I'm not even at check point 1 :/ 

not saying I deserve honour level 5 like straight away but it shouldn't take another 100 games to get to level 1.
